org.echo.mobile.framework.facade

Interface FeeFacade

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EchoFramework
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EchoFrameworkImpl, FeeFacadeImpl

    public FeeFacade

    Encapsulates logic, associated with fee configuration processes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getFeeForTransferOperation

        void getFeeForTransferOperation(java.lang.String fromNameOrId,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String toNameOrId,
                                java.lang.String amount,
                                java.lang.String asset,
                                java.lang.String feeAsset,
                                java.lang.String message,
                                Callback<java.lang.String> callback)

        Counts required fee for defined transaction settings

        Parameters:
        fromNameOrId - Source account name or id
        password - User account password for memo encryption
        toNameOrId - Target account name or id
        amount - Amount value of transfer
        asset - Specific asset type id
        feeAsset - Asset for fee calculating
        callback - Listener of operation results

      • getFeeForContractOperation

        void getFeeForContractOperation(java.lang.String userNameOrId,
                                java.lang.String contractId,
                                java.lang.String methodName,
                                java.util.List<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.contract.input.InputValue> methodParams,
                                java.lang.String assetId,
                                java.lang.String feeAsset,
                                Callback<java.lang.String> callback)

        Counts required fee for defined operation settings

        Parameters:
        userNameOrId - Source account name or id
        contractId - Id of contract for method calling
        methodName - Name of contract method for calling
        methodParams - Params of contract method for calling
        assetId - Specific asset type id
        feeAsset - Asset for fee calculating
        callback - Listener of operation results
